mapper.select: select * from t_animalshelter where shelterCode = #{shelterCode} limit 1

select * from t_animalshelter where name like CONCAT('%','${animalShelter.name}','%') or shelterAddress like CONCAT('%','${animalShelter.shelterAddress}','%') or telephone like CONCAT('%','${animalShelter.telephone}','%')
mapper.update: update t_animalshelter set shelterCode = #{animalShelter.shelterCode}, name = #{animalShelter.name}, shelterAddress = #{animalShelter.shelterAddress}, telephone = #{animalShelter.telephone}, introduction = #{animalShelter.introduction}, shelterPhotos = #{animalShelter.shelterPhotos} where id = #{animalShelter.id}
update t_animalshelter set status = #{animalShelter.status} where id = #{animalShelter.id}
